ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in FUNDRAISING INTERNSHIP AT GREEN BHUMI About Green Bhumi : Green Bhumi is a vibrant platform dedicated to fostering environmentalconsciousness and action globally. At the heart of our initiative, lies theestablishment and promotion of Environmentalism and fosteringcommunity engagement through impactful environmental activism. Green Bhumi is a flagship project (initiative) under the Top TroveFoundation that envisions a life free from pollution and enriched withfresh air. Our mission is to inspire and empower communities to plant trees, harnessing nature's positive impact on lives while contributing tosocio-economic well-being. About the Internship : We are looking for passionate and proactive FUNDRAISING INTERNSwho can raise funds by reaching out to their personal and socialnetworks, including friends, family, neighbours, and communities. Thisrole offers an opportunity to make a tangible impact by helpingGreenBhumi achieve its goals through grassroots fundraising. Requirements : â— Strong communication and persuasion skills. â— A proactive and confident approach to fundraising. â— Socially active with good networking abilities. â— Passion for environmental and social causes. â— Self-motivated, responsible, and result-oriented. â— Prior experience in Fundraising Domain will be a plus Benefits: â— Certificate of Completion â— Letter of Recommendation (performance based). â— Promotions at the Internship â— Recognition on Social Media (performance based) â— Hands-on experience in grassroots fundraising and networking. â— Opportunity to contribute to a meaningful cause and create socialimpact. â— Flexible working hours to suit your schedule. Position: Fundraising Executive (Internship) Duration: 3 Months Type: Unpaid Internship Organization: TopTrove Foundation Working Hours: Flexible Location: Remote if interested dm your CV to nandini.ag13@gmail.comAbout TopTrove Foundation: TopTrove Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to creating social impact through education, empowerment, and awareness. We believe in nurturing talent and providing young professionals with hands-on experience to grow while contributing meaningfully to society.Role: Fundraising Executive (Intern)Key Responsibilities:- Oversee and track fundraising efforts of interns in your assigned team or batch. - Guide interns on effective fundraising strategies and ethical outreach methods. - Motivate and inspire team members to meet fundraising goals through regular check-ins and support. - Provide weekly updates on individual and collective fundraising progress to the Project Head. - Suggest new and creative ideas for fundraising initiatives. - Be a role model by maintaining transparency, integrity, and enthusiast throughout the campaign.  Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

An exciting opportunity has opened to join the innovative and forward-thinking team at Tourism Tasmania, to lead the technology strategy for the agency.This role will have autonomy to create, lead and implement the overarching technology roadmap, including marketing technology stack and AI advancements as well as oversee the enterprise system roadmap with support of the wider government structure.We are looking for a talented and experienced technical expert, who can balance big picture thinking with effective execution. ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

ğŸ›‘The Biggest Scam on LinkedinğŸ›‘"I am hiring for multiple positions"Like this post and comment I am interested and we will review your profile.Share your email and phone number, and we will contact you.Warning: No recruiter or talent acquisition professional will ever hire talent in such an unprofessional way.These scammers are simply creating a database from your responses and boosting their visibility nothing more.These so-called job positions don't even exist.For example, positions like "POSITION NAME (HR Recruiter) EXPERIENCE (0-5y) & Freshers including 12th passOpportunities where they provide their phone number instead of an email ID or company website link are biggest red flags.Stay cautious!hashtag#scam hashtag#scamalert hashtag#linkedin hashtag#linkedinscam hashtag#stayalert hashtag#Staysafe hashtag#opentowork

Requirements- Strong communication and interpersonal skills - Leadership qualities and a motivational mindset - Ability to manage and mentor a team - Commitment to deadlines and responsibilities - Prior experience in volunteering/fundraising (preferred but not mandatory) Perks and Benefits:- Certificate of Completion - Letter of Recommendation (based on performance) - Leadership experience in
